channel.title: Whats A Good Free-Site For a RSPS
channel.description: Hey uuhm I Need A Website For My RSPS but idk whats a good free service (not payable ATM) Regards, Ian

item.title: Whats A Good Free-Site For a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“im hard, post:14, topic:357231”]They are both the same thing basically… Just one is for advanced users with websites and one if for dumb asses that don’t even know how to install.[/quote]I’d shut up now if you don’t want to look even worse…
The fact that you can change your SMF source (because you downloaded it) instantly makes it at least 10X better.

item.source: Whats A Good Free-Site For a RSPS

item.title: Whats A Good Free-Site For a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:9, topic:357231"][quote author=im hard link=topic=453743.msg3323445#msg3323445 date=1282902972]

Do you mean a webhost or forum software?
www.000webhost.com for a webhost
www.smfforfree.com for forum software.

Don’t EVER post smfforfree on these forums again.

Go to www.Ulmb.com register for an account

then go to www.simplemachines.org and download SMF and upload it.

You’re a fucking idiot, these forums are smf.
[/quote]

No, no, You’re a fucking idiot.

http://docs.simplemachines.org/index.php?board=2.0;sort=subject

^ This is where you install SMF.

www.Smfforfree.com

^ This is where you make a cheap ass copy.

Pros with Smfforfree

  1. Good for lazy people.
  2. Idiot friendly, such as Im hard
  3. A+ for people who are idiots and can’t follow a simple tutorial.

Cons

  1. It sucks
  2. You can’t install mods
  3. You can’t upload your own images
  4. You can’t heavily edit anything serious besides membergroups and the basic bullshit in SMF.
  5. You have a shit subdomain such as Smfforfreesucks.smfforfree4.com
  6. You get ridiculed one time or another for not having the basic knowledge on how to install SMF via webhost or FTP.

Real SMF (Pay attention Hard, because you’re pretty fucking stupid)

  1. The exact opposite on the con side of smfforfree
  2. Freedom
  3. Able to upload images
  4. Custom themes that you can write yourself
  5. Custom themes that you can download VIA SMF control panel right off of the Simplemachines website
  6. Downloadable mods, such as the visual warning mod we had back in ~06-08
  7. Shows you can actually do things yourself and not use a stupid “forum creator”
  8. Edit it to your liking
  9. Attractive, sophisticated and well organized.
  10. Easy to install.

Hopefully now you will actually learn your facts before you assume and stop being such an idiot.[/quote]

They are both the same thing basically… Just one is for advanced users with websites and one if for dumb asses that don’t even know how to install.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats A Good Free-Site For a RSPS
